trait.name: Confusing Burble
entries: The jabberwock burbles to itself unless it is {@condition incapacitated}. Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the jabberwock and is able to hear its burbling must make a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn, and it rolls a {@dice d4} to determine what it does during its current turn:

items.entry: The creature does nothing except use all its movement to move in a random direction.
The creature either makes one melee attack against a random creature it can see or does nothing if no visible creature is within its reach.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the jabberwock fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The jabberwock regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the jabberwock takes slashing damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The jabberwock dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Uncanny Tracker
entries: The jabberwock can unerringly track any creature it has wounded in the last 24 hours, and it knows the distance and direction to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The jabberwock makes two Rend attacks.

action.name: Rend
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Fiery Gaze {@recharge 5}
entries: Unless it is {@condition blinded}, the jabberwock emits a 120-foot-long, 5-foot-wide line of fire from its eyes. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 7d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The jabberwock makes one Tail attack.

legendary.name: Rend Attack (2 Actions)
entries: The jabberwock makes one Rend attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (3 Actions)
entries: The jabberwock beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the jabberwock must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.
